dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools
dependencies.name: autoconf

dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools
dependencies.name: automake

dependencies.description:
BigDFT-core: the core components of BigDFT, an electronic structure
calculation based on Daubechies wavelets.
dependencies.name: bigdft-core

dependencies.description:
BigDFT-futile: a library handling most common FORTRAN low-level
operations, like memory managment, profiling routines, I/O operations.
It also supports yaml output and parsing for fortran programs. It also
provides wrappers routines to MPI and linear algebra operations. This
library is intensively used in BigDFT packages.
dependencies.name: bigdft-futile

dependencies.description:
BigDFT-Psolver: a flexible real-space Poisson Solver based on
Interpolating Scaling Functions. It constitutes a fundamental building
block of BigDFT code, and it can also be used separately and linked to
other codes.
dependencies.name: bigdft-psolver

dependencies.description:
Lightweight but flexible shim designed to rectify the incompatibilities
between the Accelerate/vecLib BLAS and LAPACK libraries shipped with
macOS and FORTRAN code compiled with modern compilers such as GNU
Fortran.
dependencies.name: blas

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
Lightweight but flexible shim designed to rectify the incompatibilities
between the Accelerate/vecLib BLAS and LAPACK libraries shipped with
macOS and FORTRAN code compiled with modern compilers such as GNU
Fortran.
dependencies.name: lapack

dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.
dependencies.name: libtool

dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.
dependencies.name: mpi

dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries
dependencies.name: pkg-config

dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.
dependencies.name: py-pyyaml

dependencies.description:
ScaLAPACK is a library of high-performance linear algebra routines for
parallel distributed memory machines
dependencies.name: scalapack

dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-suite: the complete suite of BigDFT for electronic structure
calculation based on Daubechies wavelets.
dependent_to.name: bigdft-suite

description:
BigDFT-spred: a library for structure prediction tools, that is compiled
on top of BigDFT routines.
name: bigdft-spred

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
